Name: Seabreeze (layered version)
Instructions: POUR cranberry juice into ice-filled glass. SHAKE other ingredients with ice and carefully strain into glass to LAYER over the cranberry juice. Serve with stirrer and instruct drinker to mix layers prior to drinking.
Review: This layered version of the simple Seabreeze looks great but the layers require stirring together by the drinker to produce a balanced drink.
Nutrition: One serving of Seabreeze (layered version) contains 195 calories
